meanings.definition: A stew made with beef, onions, and beer.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious carbonnade for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served a flavorful carbonnade with tender beef and onions.
meanings.sent3: The carbonnade was so good, it made me forget about my salad!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the simmering carbonnade filled the kitchen with warmth.
meanings.sent5: Grandma's secret to a perfect carbonnade was simmering it slowly for hours.

meanings.definition: A dish of beef cooked in beer or wine with onions and herbs.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a mouthwatering carbonnade for the special occasion.
meanings.sent2: At the party, everyone raved about the delicious carbonnade served.
meanings.sent3: The carbonnade was so tasty, it disappeared within minutes!
meanings.sent4: The rich flavors of the carbonnade danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The simmering pot of carbonnade filled the room with a tempting aroma.
